message: Let's make a deal! I take $60, you take $40. It's better to secure a good deal now than risk losing value with inflation.
I think we can do better than your initial offer. Considering inflation, this is a more balanced deal.
Bob, my offer is more than fair considering the inflation is hitting me harder.  Let's close this deal and avoid further losses.
I understand inflation is affecting you more, but I'm not willing to settle for less than half. This is my counteroffer, considering the current value of the money.
